Hi! 

I am currently a Postdoctoral Researcher at the University of Lisbon.  
I am working with Prof Bruno Loff on the Hardness of Finding Good Algorithms (project HoFGA). I am a member of the research unit LASIGE at the Faculty of Sciences of the University of Lisbon.   

## Research Interests
Complexity theory, Circut Complexity, Communication and Query Complexity, 
Fourier Analysis, Data Structures lower bounds. 


## Education

PhD in Computer Science </br>
Tata Institute of Fundmental Research, Mumbai. 

MSc in Computer Science </br>
Chennai Mathematical Institute, Chennai. 

BSc(Hons.) in Mathematics and Computer Science </br>
Chennai Mathematical Institute, Chennai.
